text: Aru hosa pora bhi Isor pora kunba ke girja te sabole rakhise, poila jaga to Tai laga basi luwa chela khan hobo, dusra to bhabobadi khan, tisra to hikhok khan, etu pichete asurit kaam kora khan, pichete bhal kori diya laga bordan, modot kora khan, bhal pora cholai kene ja, aru alag kisim laga bhasha kowa khan.
